global_attributes.comment: OOI Open Ocean Gliders are typically deployed with a WET Labs ECO Puck FLBB (FLORD - 2 Channel), but this glider was deployed with a WET Labs ECO Puck FLBBCD (FLORT - 3 Channel). Glider experienced early battery depletion on 2023-04-07 and was put into surface drift mode until recovery. No data expected after this date.
global_attributes.OOI_platform_type: OOI Global Station Papa 1000m Open Ocean Glider

platform.long_name: OOI Global Station Papa 1000m Open Ocean Slocum Glider gp_363
